> Tucson now transformed into robot mode, takes a seat next to Rodim=
us's bedside, and prepares to sit it out for a long time, not moving from h=
is spot. If anything else he was there for support. He had hoped by doing s=
o, Rodimus's condition may change gradually. Yet he had time to respond to =
Perceptor and Kup as they were leaving.
>
> " Do what you can to help Night=
light. I'll stay with Rodimus to be sure he remains stable."
>
> In his lar=
ger body frame, it was a bit hard for him to make himself comfortable yet, =
to him comfort was the last thing on his mind. He knew he needed Rodimus no=
t only as a comrade, but as a friend. It was the one thing that Hydras didn=
't have and a power he'd never experience. The power of friendship.
>
> " H=
opefully you can hear me Rodimus. I promise you as an Autobot and a Prime, =
that I will NEVER give up fighting unitl the day comes when the wars finall=
y cease. After the wars, restoration is in order. But if we're going to ach=
ieve these goals, the leaders of the Autobots and the Maximals must come to=
gether as a whole and only then can we restore order on this planet. There'=
s just one problem, you've slipped away on us, unintentionally of course, b=
ut without you we're not as powerful as we can be. But with you we can give=
 this planet what it desperately needs, new hope and the promise of new lif=
e. Never give up your drive to restore order, for it's a drive that we all =
share and treasure and a drive that no evil force can ever bring down."

ights and biceps were red. As with many Maximals it was easy to

.

Santon looked up, it was obvious that he was not happy with yet
another =
intrusion on what could turn out to be an incredibly delicate
operation. "T=
uscon Prime." Santon said, his voice carrying the full
weight of acting chi=
ef medical officer, "I will have to ask you and
any others who wish to watc=
h to wait in the observation room." Santon
pointed to the room easily visab=
le on the other side of clear
plexiglass. He looked back at Rodimus as he h=
eard a beep from one of
the sensors.

Legacy spoke up from his position, "I=
t would appear that his life

gin, now would be the
